thread.title: Draymond Green is kicking again, this time against Blake Griffin
thread.title_full: Draymond Green is kicking again, this time against Blake Griffin

author: Tim Cato
title: Draymond Green is kicking again, this time against Blake Griffin
text:
Welp.
Draymond Green kicked someone again.
I’m going to let the video speak for itself. Green says his kicks are involuntary reactions and natural motions throughout the course of playing basketball. If nothing else, let’s just say that he makes very solid contact with Blake Griffin there, who’s trying to tie him up for a loose ball.
Literally earlier in the day, there’s a Draymond Green video game that combined NBA Jam and karate that was released. He has a long history of kicking people, after all.
In the play-by-play data, the play is listed as this: Draymond Green lost ball turnover (Blake Griffin steals) 
If only it was that simple.
